message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer gives me a slight advantage, but you'll still get a good chunk.
Alice, my turn! I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out. Take this deal and we both win big.
Okay Bob, let's be reasonable.  My last offer was more than fair. This time I'm reducing my share a little, but remember the clock is ticking and it's your money that's losing value.
Alice, you're being stubborn! This offer is even better than before. The clock is ticking, and not just for me! Let's be smart and end this.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm lowering my share again, even though it's YOUR money that's losing value.  Take the deal before it shrinks further!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. Let's split this evenly and call it a day. A 50/50 split is the fairest I can offer, take it while it's still worth something!
